title: Seeing someone you love imprisoned in a dream

preview.html: Seeing someone you love imprisoned in a dream about a man. There are many interpretations and connotations of seeing someone you love imprisoned in a man’s dream. The most important of these interpretations are the following: If someone sees in a dream that someone close to him is imprisoned. This indicates that this person faces many difficulties in life other than... Psychological pressures that he cannot get rid of. Also, dreaming of seeing someone imprisoned in a dream indicates that this person is suffering from a kind of confusion and tension and there is no confidence in him. And that he feels a kind of delay in his life and this is a sign that the person is subject to restrictions and many false beliefs. In his life. Whoever sees in a dream that he has been acquitted of one of the charges against him. This indicates that the problems that the person suffers from in his life will be solved, his distress will be removed, and his debts will be paid, God willing. Escaping from prison is also a sign that the dreamer is avoiding the sins that he may fall into. See also: Interpretation of seeing a prison in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of seeing someone she loves imprisoned in a dream for a married woman. Women are the most sensitive beings and therefore they feel a lot of feelings in their emotions. Perhaps one of the most important indicators of these dreams is the following: A married woman who sees a prisoner in a dream loves her. This is an indicator. However, she feels a lot of feelings of sadness and sorrow that control this woman. They will face some difficult things. But if a married woman dreams that she is going to prison to visit someone she loves and is dear to her, and there are dogs behind her. This dream indicates that there are some evil people controlling her life. And that there are those who control her personality, her life, and her thoughts in a way that limits her freedom. But if a married woman sees in her dream that someone she loves is escaping from prison, this indicates that she will get rid of the pain she is experiencing and will begin a new life and a special stage in her life. But if a married woman sees in A dream is that someone dear to her has been acquitted from prison. It indicates success and excellence in work and diligence in life. And if a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is imprisoned and that she is sad in his absence. It shows that she is suffering from a lot of stress and psychological crises at that stage in her life. , which makes her feel sad and upset. And that this woman is enduring this difficult life only for the sake of her children, and she does not have her right as a wife. And if a married woman sees in a dream that she and her loved one are escaping from prison, and that there are guard dogs chasing her, then this is true. This is an indication that there are many Haters and jealousy in her life. Regardless of the many injustices in her life, she will overcome this injustice, God willing. There are some dream interpreters who indicate that the interpretation of dreams is to see a married woman dreaming that her husband is imprisoned. It can be a sign and strong evidence that you are suffering from a problem. Debts. There may also be many problems between her and her husband. But if a woman sees her husband in prison, this is evidence of getting rid of these problems, God willing. Interpretation of seeing someone she loves imprisoned in a dream for a pregnant woman. The pregnant woman is considered one of the people most exposed to dreams because of the period during which

title: Interpretation of a dream about my mother becoming a young man in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my mother becoming a young man in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about my mother becoming a young man in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my mother becoming young in a dream, perhaps expressing support for the mother, and God knows everything. Just as an unmarried young man sees the mother returning young, this may indicate some good things, and God knows everything. The Most High and Most Knowing: If the dreamer sees a woman in a dream returning as a child, this may lead to a lack of money, and God knows best. You may also see the mother returning new in a dream, then this may be evidence of the mother’s support, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my mother in a dream Interpretation of a dream about my crazy mother in a dream may be evidence of Some of the problems she may encounter, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that her mother is crazy, it may express the mother’s unintended mistreatment of someone, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees her mother crazy in a dream, this may represent the mother being exposed to some crises, and God is Greatest. And I know, if a divorced woman sees her mother losing her mind in a dream, this may indicate that she will be exposed to some problems that she cannot solve, and God knows everything that is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about my weak mother in a dream Interpretation of a dream about my mother is impossible in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, the Thinness in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a skinny woman in a dream, this may indicate illness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a skinny unmarried girl in a dream, this may be evidence that he will suffer losses in some projects, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my mother praying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother praying in a dream could be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. Whereas if a married woman sees a mother praying in a dream, this may indicate happiness and joy, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees a mother praying in a dream, this may be a sign of... Relief and comfort, and God knows best. When you see a mother praying in a dream, it can be a sign of getting rid of problems, and God knows everything that is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about my mother screaming at me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother screaming at me in a dream could express a person getting angry with the dreamer, and God knows best. The Unseen: If a married woman sees her mother screaming at her in a dream, this may be evidence of her shortcomings towards the mother, and God knows the unseen. Like a single girl who sees her mother screaming at her, some unrighteous things could appear, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees her mother screaming at her In a dream, this may indicate her shortcomings in relation to the mother, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my mother who wakes me up from sleep in a dream Interpretation of dreams about my mother who wakes me up from sleep In a dream, waking up from sleep can express the awakening of neglect, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees himself in The dreamer wakes up, then he may be able to control his negligence, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream waking up from sleep, this may represent the good luck that she enjoys, and God knows the unseen. title: I dreamed that I was driving a car with a dead person

preview.html: I dreamed that I was driving a car with a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing yourself driving a car with a dead person is one of the beautiful visions that symbolizes positive and happy changes in one’s life, so we will talk about all of these interpretations through this article about a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a married man, a single young man, and a divorced woman. I dreamed that I was driving a car with a dead person. A dead woman for a single girl: Seeing a single girl driving a car with a dead person in a dream is one of the most beautiful visions that indicate happy news in her life, such as marriage or obtaining a great job. Seeing a single person driving a car with a dead person, its interpretation varies depending on the color. In the case of green, it indicates high morals. For her fiancé and his great status among people. Driving a black car is a bad vision that indicates anxiety, extreme sadness, loneliness and depression. Seeing a single woman driving a red car with a dead person in a dream is an example of happiness and intense love for her husband. I dreamed that I was driving a car with a dead married woman on a large scale. jpgSeeing a married woman driving a car with a dead man near her indicates that many positive changes will occur in her life and the life of her husband and that everything they want and dream of will come true. Seeing a married woman driving her car with people close to her expresses her strength and authority over others. Seeing a married woman driving her car in a dream indicates With one of her children to the imminent marriage of one of them. Seeing a married woman driving her car with her traveling husband sitting next to him indicates their meeting again and their eternal love and devotion to each other. What is the interpretation of seeing a man driving a car with a dead person in a dream? Seeing a man driving a car with a dead person in a dream is an indication that the fortuneteller He will be offered many jobs, and he will succeed in one of them and obtain an important position. Seeing a man driving a blue car in a dream indicates that he is completely far from the teachings of his religion and has corrupt morals. Seeing a married man driving a car with his friends is a sign that will bring him good and abundant food. What is the interpretation of seeing a young man driving a car with someone in A dream? Seeing a young man driving a car with someone who is sick and being close to him indicates a speedy recovery from all diseases. Seeing a young man riding in a car with a stranger is a sign of trying to get rid of him and solving all his family and academic problems. A young man seeing himself driving a race car in a dream is a sign of recklessness and arrogance in people. Seeing a young man Driving a luxury car with a beautiful girl, showing his great admiration for her and his idea of ​​communicating with her. What is the interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin driving a car in a dream? Seeing Ibn Sirin driving a car in a dream indicates the dreamer’s high status, people’s respect for him, the abundance of God’s blessings upon him, and his closeness to his Lord. Vision Selling a car in a dream is a sign of a major scandal among people, his loss of an important position in society, and his failure to manage his affairs and solve his problems. Seeing a huge car in a dream indicates that the dreamer is going through a difficult period in his life and its complete destruction and is trying to overcome crises. You can write your dream from

title: A detailed interpretation of raisins in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of raisins in a dream in detail: Raisins help lose weight when replaced with some sugars and help satisfy appetite and increase energy, especially in the winter, and athletes increase energy because they contain certain minerals and vitamins. He and her being close to him, he removes worries and sorrows from her life, God willing, so in this article today we will learn together in detail the interpretation of raisins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing raisins in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that a dream about raisins in general indicates an abundance of goodness. Whoever sees it in a dream If he picked raisins lying on the ground, his dream indicates that he will soon receive an inheritance. If a single man dreams that he is distributing raisins, this is good news that his marriage is imminent. A dream of distributing raisins to people is considered a sign that the dreamer will travel in reality. This dream may indicate love People for specialization. Seeing him eating raisins in a dream means that the dreamer will hear good news soon. Interpretation of seeing raisins in Ibn Shaheen’s dream interpretation. The scholar Ibn Shaheen believes that seeing raisins in a dream is a good vision because it gave the dreamer good news that he will soon obtain goodness and abundance. As for the one who saw In his dream that he is eating raisins, it means that God Almighty gives him a permissible job for which he will be provided with. If someone dreams that he is drying raisins, his dream shows that God Almighty gives him money, but after a while. Whoever sees that he is collecting raisins on the ground, his dreams indicate That he will soon receive a large inheritance. Distributing raisins to people in a dream indicates that the dreamer benefits others by knowing him and seeing him. Interpretation of seeing raisins for a single womanOne of the dreams of an unmarried woman is that she dreams of raisins, because it is a sign that God will grant her goodness in her life. If an unmarried woman sees In her dream that she is buying raisins, her dream indicates that she will make the right decision regarding one of the matters related to her future. If you give raisins to the person with whom you have a relationship in a dream, it means that you will marry him soon. The dream of raisins, which a single woman dreams about generally indicates , indicates that God will fulfill her desires and dreams. If raisins appear in large quantities in the dream, this symbolizes that he will obtain a lot of money, whether from work or inheritance. Whoever sees in her dream that she is giving raisins to her relative or friend, this indicates the strength of the dreamer’s relationship to whom she gave them. Interpretation of a vision of raisins for a married woman. Raisins in a married woman’s dream symbolize the goodness that she will obtain. One of the good dreams of a married woman is her dream of buying raisins, because it is a good omen for her that she will become pregnant soon. This vision may indicate that God will bless her and make her and her family happy. The dream of a married woman Large quantities of raisins indicate her deliverance from her worries and the end of her problems with her husband. A married woman’s dream of giving raisins to her husband symbolizes that their relationship will be dominated by understanding and love. If someone sees in her dream that she is harvesting or collecting raisins, her dream indicates that God will bless her with children and her money. A married woman who distributes raisins to her neighbors, friends, and family in

title: Seeing an ophthalmologist in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Visiting an ophthalmologist, Ibn Sirin, for single people. Interpretation of seeing an ophthalmologist in a dream. For a single girl, this is evidence of success and excellence in her professional and personal life. The dream of an ophthalmologist also indicates that this girl is sociable and many turn to her in trouble. A visit to the ophthalmologist also indicates that this girl will get married soon. From a person who suits her well. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing an ophthalmologist for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl sees that she is going to an ophthalmologist and he prescribes medicine for her, this indicates that she is very close to God Almighty. If an unmarried girl sees that she is at the ophthalmologist and he gives her medicine while she is in pain and crying Then she was healed, this indicates her recovery from the diseases that afflicted her. If she sees an ophthalmologist treating her in a dream, this means that she will hear happy news. Individual interpretation of the vision of going to the doctor: Seeing a single girl traveling to a far place to visit her ophthalmologist. This vision indicates joy and happiness, as well as a good opportunity for work. And living. If the girl is sick and sees in a dream that she is going to the doctor, this indicates a short recovery. But if the girl sees that she went to the ophthalmologist and finds him dead, then this indicates the death of the mother, and it is one of the unpleasant visions. But if the girl is in good health She is not sick and you saw the doctor entering her, so this indicates that he prescribed a medicine that would benefit him. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital situation in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about someone I know ignoring me from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about someone I know ignoring me: In a dream, it is a dream that carries within it many feelings of sadness and sorrow for whoever sees it, especially if the person who is turning away from me is someone I love. Love is a relationship between two parties in which care and giving prevail, but not everything one wants to achieve, so in the following lines we provide a detailed explanation of this dream. Interpretation of dreams about someone I know ignoring meInterpretation of a dream about someone I know ignoring me includes many clues, some of which give hope for good and others not like that. He must face them patiently without opposing God’s decree. In other places, the dream is considered a warning bell for the immoral actions he is doing, which would cause dissatisfaction with those around him. He must repent and turn to God, and the vision is news of overcoming a difficult matter. It was the cause of the misery and unhappiness of the one who saw it, so he should thank God for passing through this difficult period in his life. Likewise, testimony in dealing with a person who deliberately did not pay attention to him is evidence of the person’s insistence and continuation in discrimination and receiving its reasons, and seeing the young man and girl is a warning to them. Do not allow people to enter. They enter their lives in the name of love and companionship and they are not qualified for it. Be careful before choosing. Interpretation of a dream about someone I know ignoring me by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that this vision expresses the negative transformations that the dreamer is going through in his life, which have led him to a state of psychological imbalance and may reach the point of losing confidence in himself and those around him. And God knows best. Therefore, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, and God alone knows the unseen. The woman who watches over her husband is the one who offers her, even though she does everything in her power to make him happy and build the family. It is the truth and each party must think about it and consider it before completing this link. Interpretation of a dream about someone I know ignoring me regarding single people. title: Interpretation of a dream about signs of the Day of Resurrection

preview.html: Including the sun rising from the west, the Antichrist and other signs, and since we found that dream interpreters mentioned that seeing it in a dream is not frightening or disturbing. But it is related to the dreamer in the dream as a warning sign to correct himself and his behavior, and this is if it is a mistake and bad actions that he commits The person.Interpretation of a dream about the signs of the Day of Resurrection. It is said: Seeing the signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream. Perhaps it is evidence that the dreamer is a witness to the ability of God Almighty to remove injustice from His oppressed servants and how He restored to them their rights. Likewise, seeing a dream about the signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream. It may be a sign of... That the dreamer may decide to travel abroad in the very near future. Seeing signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream portends the dream. The dreamer is a good person, with good morals and ethics. Seeing signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream symbolizes: The dreamer will see the miracle of Almighty God in saving His righteous servants from crises and situations. Difficult. Seeing the signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream indicates the opening of graves. Is the divine witness to the miracle of God Almighty’s work in supporting every person who has been wronged or exposed to harm and harm? See also: Interpretation of seeing the Day of Resurrection in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing the signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream. It was said: Seeing the signs of the Day of Resurrection In a dream, the bad deeds in the scale are greater than the good deeds. This is an indication that the dreamer will follow the path of repentance, guidance, and piety that will bring him closer to God, Lord of the Worlds. The interpreters also mentioned that seeing signs on the Day of Resurrection in a dream and doing good deeds are less than the bad deeds. This symbolizes that the dreamer He fears God Almighty in his actions and words so that he will not be exposed to severe punishment. Seeing signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream portends the dream. The dreamer is very committed to the religion and is ready to retain its teachings and apply them in his life. It is said: Seeing signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream. It could be evidence that God The Almighty will decree for the dreamer victory over all who want evil and evil. It is said: Seeing the signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream and walking on the path. This is evidence that the dreamer will be saved from the great distress that almost befalls him. Interpretation of a dream about the signs of the Day of Resurrection for a single woman. It is said: Seeing the signs of the Day of Resurrection. In a dream for an unmarried girl. It could be a sign that she needs to review herself from time to time about everything she does in her life, so that she does not feel regret later. Also, seeing signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream for unmarried women indicates that everything must be accounted for. He has committed some bad deeds or bad deeds, and he must stay away from them and not return to them again. Commentators have narrated that seeing verses on the Day of Resurrection for single people in a dream may be evidence that she will soon marry one of the righteous young men. Also, seeing verses on the Day of Resurrection for an unmarried girl in her dream symbolizes To: They will succeed in their studies and obtain the highest diplomas and academic degrees. Seeing signs of the Day of Resurrection in a dream indicates an unmarried woman. He will find the job he has always dreamed of. It is said that seeing an unmarried girl dreams of signs of the Day of Resurrection in her sleep.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ship in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a divorced woman

preview.html: The ship is one of the means of transportation used to transport passengers and goods at sea. The ship has been known since the time of our Prophet Noah, peace be upon him, and it was the means of salvation for his people. Seeing a ship in a dream can indicate escape from danger, along with many other indicators that this vision carries, which we will explain to you. Interpretation of a dream about a head in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream for a single girl. Dream interpreters say that an unmarried girl who is boarding a large ship In a dream, it indicates her marriage to a man who can achieve the happiness she wants. If this girl is engaged during this period, then her boarding the ship with her fiancé indicates a feeling of security and psychological comfort with him. The ship in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates that she meets that girl’s needs and comforts her. Of her worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream about planting in a dream. The meaning of seeing a boat trip for a married woman. A married woman who boards a ship with her husband and children declares that she will bring her children to safety. The ship that appears in a married woman’s dream indicates financial prosperity and that woman will be freed from her financial crises and debts. A ship in a married woman’s dream indicates that this woman will get rid of the haters and jealous people in her life who are trying to trap her and her husband. If the dreamer is sick, riding a ship may herald her recovery from her illness. Riding a boat for a married woman could be one of the signs of multiple births. For that woman. Interpretation of seeing a monkey in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a ship in a dream for a man and its meaning. The ship that appears in a man’s dream indicates a person’s travel abroad to earn a wide livelihood. A ship in a distinguished man’s dream indicates new projects, in the abundance of halal food that comes to this man. If this person is surrounded by a group of problems and crises, then boarding a ship warns him of escaping these problems. A man riding a ship in his dream promises him that he will achieve many successes and achievements in the field of work in which he works. Interpretation of a dream about a wall in a dream. Driving a boat in a dream for a woman A divorced woman riding a ship with an unknown man is one of the signs that heralds her marriage to a good man who will compensate her for her ex-husband. Riding a ship in a dream for a divorced woman also indicates that she will be saved from the worries, sadness, and pain that she was feeling. If the divorced woman sees that she is riding a ship with her ex-husband This indicates that she will return to her husband again. Interpretation of a dream about a dome in a dream. The meaning of seeing a ship in a dream for a young man. A young man who boards a ship and commits sins and forbidden things. This vision shows that this young man abandons these sins and disobedience and resorts to God Almighty. And boarding the ship in relation to For a young man, it is a sign of that young man’s victory over his enemies, whether in the work environment or in his social life environment. The young man’s boarding of the ship with the girl he desires to have a relationship with is a sign of the fulfillment of this desire and this young man’s relationship with her in the near future. The young man who boarded the ship indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet in a dream is one of the most important interpretations that women search for, especially since women love to wear gold jewelry in reality, but men are confused about seeing this dream and wonder about its connotations and meanings. We will clarify these concepts in the following lines. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet in a dream. Seeing a gold bracelet in a dream means: Restrictions or symbolizes work because a golden bracelet in a dream is a sign of one’s ability to endure. Crises. In the case of precious stones in the bracelet, the gold piece symbolizes fatigue, effort, and difficulties. It symbolizes the responsibilities that the dreamer will bear in the coming period, and seeing a golden bracelet in the dreamer’s hand means that he is constantly thinking about the responsibilities entrusted to him. A gold bracelet studded with diamonds in a dream It means that happiness and exhaustion are mixed in the dreamer's life, while a bracelet that contains both gold and silver indicates that the dreamer will live in a period full of joy. A man wearing a gold bracelet in a dream is an undesirable dream because it symbolizes that this man will go to prison because of... The problems that he will face. Losing a gold bracelet in a dream means that the dreamer will get rid of his troubles and problems, but if he finds the bracelet, this means that these problems will increase. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted this vision as follows. A gold bracelet is a sign of wealth, an increase in money, or achieving a lot of profits from successful projects that he will achieve in the future. The gold bracelet that contains a percentage of the new metal symbolizes the restrictions that the dreamer cannot break free of, and that these restrictions appear in the form of pressures that he is exposed to. In daily life. A penguin in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet in a dream for a single woman. According to dream interpretation scholars: The interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet in an unmarried woman’s dream is: She is approaching her marriage to a rich man. The girl with the dream will achieve what she aspires to in life, whether at work or Education, and she will be happy in her life. For an unmarried woman to wear a golden bracelet in her dream means that she will maintain her chastity and honor or that she will possess many good things. Wearing a golden bracelet in a dream also means that a single woman will advance academically and practically. If the bracelet she saw The girl in her dream that what she wears contains many colors, this means that her future will be bright. The girl in a dream who receives a gold bracelet as a gift from someone means that she will marry a young man who appears handsome and has good morals. Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing a gold bracelet in a dream for a woman. Interpretation of the married woman and the woman. Pregnant women in their dreams dream of a gold bracelet as follows: A married woman will get a lot of money or good offspring for her children. A married woman who wears a gold bracelet in her dream indicates that her husband is good, and that his offspring

title: Interpretation of the shrine in a dream and the shrine of Ibn Sirin and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of the shrine in a dream and the shrine of Ibn Sirin and its meaning, especially since this dream includes many symbols and many clues, as the shrine is the graves found especially in the parents of the righteous and the difference in interpretations, the clues are based on what was mentioned in the dream with different details, as we will explain to you in brief The article: Interpretation of the shrine in a dream and the shrine of Ibn Sirin and its meaning.Interpretation of the shrine in a dream and the shrine of Ibn Sirin and its meaning, as this vision includes many interpretations and connotations that are between positive and negative, and differ due to the details and scenes that we see in the dream, and in this context we explain to you the interpretation of the shrine in a dream and the shrine of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin also means: If a person sees the shrine in a dream, this is evidence that the fortuneteller is committing some violations. These are the reasons for his imprisonment, if he is alive inside the sanctuary. In addition to seeing the construction of the shrine in a dream. It is evidence of the construction of the new house in the reality of the dreamer. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. In addition, if a single man sees in a dream the construction of a shrine. This dream is a sign of his marriage in the near future. See also: Interpretation of seeing images in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Seeing a shrine in a dream by Ibn Sirin.. Interpretation of a shrine in a dream. It is an important vision. Quite a few people, but it has so many implications and interpretations that it could be a good sign for the world. In this context, we explain to you an interpretation of seeing a shrine in a dream by Ibn Sirinho. Also: Seeing the shrine of the sheikh in a dream and wanting to visit the graves. It is evidence of preserving family ties and visiting his relatives. Likewise, seeing digging the shrine of the sheikh in a dream is evidence of good health and prolonging the life of the dreamer. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing yourself sitting among the graves in a dream is a sign of the abundance of deceivers and hypocrites in the dreamer’s life. It also indicates the viewer’s lack of interest in the important things in his life. In addition, seeing a raindrop in the sheikh’s shrine is a sign of God’s satisfaction with the dreamer. And God’s response to all his prayers. In addition to seeing the shrine of Sheikh Saleh in a dream. This dream is evidence of the dreamer’s high morals, as it shows his intense love for doing good and helping others. Seeing the shrine in a dream for a married woman. Of course, seeing the shrine is one of the visions that have many interpretations, so the differences in it are based on The status of the viewer, and of course for a married woman, it carries meanings that can be positive and good news, and here we present to you an explanation. Seeing a shrine in a dream for a married woman is also: If a married woman dreams that she is visiting one of the graves of the righteous God or one of the shrines of God’s righteous parents. She was also requesting a wish that God wants to fulfill. He gives it to her. This dream is evidence that this woman will fulfill this desire. This vision is also evidence that God Almighty will grant this good and poor woman what she desires in life, and God Almighty knows that. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a blanket in a dream and its effects. Interpretation of Ma’bad Mrs. Zainab in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, as these visions
